history.proof: intros p q H. qsimpl time: 1 use: Rlt_le. qsimpl time: 1 use: Z2R_le,Rlt_le. qsimpl time: 1 use: Z2R_le,Rlt_le,Z. apply positive_ind. qsimpl time: 1 use: Z2R_le,Rlt_le,Z. qsimpl time: 1 use: Z2R_le,Rlt_le,Z. qsimpl time: 1 use: Z2R_le,Rlt_le,Z,le_refl. - hauto use: IZR_lt, Z.compare_nlt_iff, Z2R_correct. - sfirstorder depth: 3use: Z2R_le, Rlt_le, Z, le_refl.

In environment H1 : forall r1 r2 : R, r1 < r2 -> r1 <= r2 H : forall p q : Z, (p <= q)%Z -> Z2R p <= Z2R q p, q : Z H2 : (p ?= q)%Z = Lt The term "0" has type "R" while it is expected to have type "Z".
The reference H was not found in the current environment.
Found no subterm matching "(?M2483 + 0)%Z" in the current goal.

In environment H3 : forall r1 r2 : R, r1 < r2 -> r1 <= r2 H0 : forall p q : Z, (p <= q)%Z -> Z2R p <= Z2R q p, q : Z H2 : (p ?= q)%Z = Lt Unable to unify "(?M2483 ?= ?M2483)%Z = Gt -> False" with "Z2R p < Z2R q".

original: intros p q H. apply Rlt_le. apply Z2R_le. apply Z.lt_le_add_lt with (n := p) (m := q) (p := 0) (q := 0). apply H. rewrite Z.add_0_r. rewrite Z.add_0_r. apply Z.le_refl.
